featured.title: Imaginary World
featured.subtitle: Web3 Gaming & NFT Staking Platform
featured.description: A core engagement platform for Imaginary Ones ecosystem where users can stake NFTs, participate in adventures, and earn rewards through gamified experiences.
featured.longDescription: The Imaginary World website is a core engagement platform developed by Imaginary Ones Pte Ltd. It offers holders a way to interact with their NFTs and tokens in a gamified, rewarding environment. Users can stake their Imaginary Ones NFTs directly on the platform to participate in a variety of adventures, earning rewards over time based on their activity and commitment. The site also hosts unique seasonal experiences such as the Imaginary Carnival, where participants can stake their $BUBBLE tokens, play mini-games, and compete for prizes.
challenges: Integrating complex smart contract interactions with user-friendly UI
Managing real-time NFT staking and reward calculations
Building scalable Web3 authentication and wallet connection
achievements: Successfully launched NFT staking platform with 1000+ active users
Implemented seamless Web3 wallet integration
Built complex reward distribution system with smart contracts

featured.title: BUBBLE Token Platform
featured.subtitle: Web3 Token Distribution & Staking
featured.description: Official platform for $BUBBLE token claiming, and ecosystem interaction with smart contract integration and NFT holder benefits.
featured.longDescription: The BUBBLE platform serves as the official hub for $BUBBLE, the utility token developed by Imaginary Ones Pte Ltd. This token is integral to the Imaginary World ecosystem, facilitating transactions across gaming, merchandise, and content. The site offers eligible users the ability to claim their allocated $BUBBLE tokens through integration with smart contracts, with eligibility extending to holders of specific NFTs and participants in social and gaming activities.
challenges: Building secure token claiming mechanism with smart contracts
Implementing complex eligibility verification system
Managing high-volume token distribution events
achievements: Successfully distributed tokens to 5000+ eligible users
Built robust smart contract integration with zero security issues
Implemented efficient NFT holder verification system

featured.title: Bubio.ai
featured.subtitle: AI-Powered Chat Platform with Monetization
featured.description: Modern AI chat platform built with React.js featuring intelligent conversations, user authentication, subscription management, and seamless payment processing through Stripe integration.
featured.longDescription: Bubio.ai is a sophisticated AI-powered chat platform that delivers intelligent conversational experiences to users. Built with React.js and powered by Supabase for backend services, the platform offers seamless user authentication, real-time chat capabilities, and robust data management. The integration with Stripe enables flexible subscription models and payment processing, allowing users to access premium AI features. The platform emphasizes user experience with a clean, responsive interface and efficient state management for handling complex chat interactions and user sessions.
challenges: Integrating AI chat APIs with real-time user interactions
Implementing secure payment processing with Stripe subscriptions
Managing complex state for chat history and user sessions
Optimizing performance for real-time chat experiences
achievements: Built scalable AI chat platform with real-time capabilities
Implemented secure user authentication and session management
Integrated flexible subscription and payment system
Achieved seamless user experience with responsive design

featured.title: Imaginary Rides NFT Platform
featured.subtitle: 3D Animated NFT Collection & Ecosystem
featured.description: Central platform for Imaginary Rides NFT collection featuring 3D animated artworks, staking mechanisms, and ecosystem integration with smart contracts.
featured.longDescription: The Imaginary Rides Site serves as the central platform for Imaginary Rides, the second NFT collection from Imaginary Ones. This collection features meticulously crafted 3D animated artworks categorized into Air, Land, and Sea rides. Holders gain access to the broader Imaginary Ones ecosystem and can participate in the Bubble Squad feature to earn Rainbow Bubbles and exclusive $BUBBLE token allocations.
challenges: Building complex NFT ecosystem integration
Implementing multi-phase minting with deposit system
Creating seamless 3D NFT display and interaction
achievements: Successfully launched second major NFT collection
Built innovative deposit-based minting system

featured.title: PageCart
featured.subtitle: E-commerce Book Store Platform
featured.description: Modern e-commerce platform for book purchases featuring React.js frontend, Supabase backend, Stripe payment integration, and FedEx shipping API for seamless online book shopping experience.
featured.longDescription: PageCart is a comprehensive e-commerce platform specifically designed for book lovers and retailers. Built with modern web technologies, the platform offers a seamless shopping experience from browsing to delivery. The React.js frontend provides an intuitive and responsive user interface, while TypeScript ensures type safety and better development experience. Supabase powers the backend with real-time database capabilities, user authentication, and secure data management. The integration with Stripe enables secure payment processing with support for various payment methods, while FedEx API integration provides reliable shipping solutions with real-time tracking capabilities. The platform emphasizes user experience with features like advanced book search, categorization, user reviews, and order management.
challenges: Integrating multiple third-party APIs (Stripe and FedEx) seamlessly
Building scalable e-commerce architecture with inventory management
Implementing secure payment processing and order tracking
Creating responsive design for optimal mobile shopping experience
achievements: Built modern e-commerce platform with React and TypeScript
Integrated secure payment processing with Stripe
Implemented real-time shipping tracking with FedEx API
Created scalable backend architecture with Supabase

projects.title: Imaginary Rides Smart Contract
projects.subtitle: ERC721A-based NFT Distribution System
projects.description: Advanced ERC721A smart contract for structured NFT distribution combining deposit-based access, whitelisting, and multiple airdrop types with Merkle proof access control.
projects.longDescription: IR is an ERC721A-based smart contract developed for a structured NFT distribution system that combines deposit-based access, whitelisting, and multiple airdrop types. The contract supports both guaranteed and non-guaranteed deposits through VIP and FCFS whitelists, using Merkle proofs for access control. It includes logic for handling refunds, ensures fair supply allocation, and manages airdrops for holders, leaderboard participants, the treasury, and special gifts. The project includes royalty support (ERC2981), operator filtering for marketplace compliance, and advanced state tracking for deposits and airdrops. The minting process is tightly regulated by rules around maximum allocations and user categories, ensuring both security and fairness throughout the drop lifecycle.
challenges: Implementing complex deposit-based access system with refunds
Managing multiple whitelist types with Merkle proof verification
Building fair airdrop distribution across different user categories
achievements: Successfully deployed ERC721A contract with advanced features
Implemented secure Merkle proof-based whitelist system
Built comprehensive airdrop and refund management system

projects.title: IO Garage, IO Sphere, IO Ride Smart Contract
projects.subtitle: Multi-Contract Gamified NFT Ecosystem
projects.description: Connected suite of smart contracts powering a multi-phase, gamified NFT minting experience with reveal mechanics that transform garage NFTs into rides and spheres.
projects.longDescription: IOGarage, IORides, and IOSpheres form a connected suite of smart contracts that power a multi-phase, gamified NFT minting experience on Ethereum. At the core of the system is IOGarage, an ERC721A-based contract that allows users to mint garage NFTs through both free and public sale phases. Free minting leverages Merkle Tree whitelist verification, while public minting is protected by ECDSA signature validation and nonce tracking to prevent bots and replay attacks. IOGarage enforces strict mint limits, supplies, and ownership checks while incorporating customizable royalty settings and operator filtering for compliance with major marketplaces. What makes this system unique is the reveal mechanism inside IOGarage, where users can 'reveal' their garage NFT to receive two separate assets: an ERC721 token from IORides, and an ERC1155 token from IOSpheres. This transformation is only triggered by the IOGarage contract, ensuring a tightly controlled, trustless minting flow. The IORides contract is a standard ERC721 with enumerable functionality and marketplace compliance via operator filtering, designed to mint unique tokens corresponding to the garage's revealed identity. In parallel, IOSpheres introduces a flexible ERC1155 implementation with upgradeability support. Each sphere type can have different max supplies and minting rules, enabling dynamic token generation tied to the garage reveal event. All three contracts are modular but interdependent, with strict access control ensuring that only IOGarage can mint IORides and IOSpheres, preserving the integrity of the reveal mechanic. The architecture enables engaging, multi-token utility while maintaining scalability, upgradability, and security through best practices, including custom errors for gas optimization, reentrancy protection, and full support for royalty standards like ERC2981. This system demonstrates a creative and secure approach to interconnected NFTs and collectible mechanics on-chain.
challenges: Designing interconnected multi-contract architecture with reveal mechanics
Implementing secure cross-contract minting with access control
Building complex ERC721A + ERC1155 transformation system
Ensuring gas optimization across multiple contract interactions
achievements: Successfully architected complex multi-contract NFT ecosystem
Implemented innovative reveal-to-mint transformation mechanics
Built secure cross-contract communication with strict access control
Created modular system supporting ERC721A, ERC721, and ERC1155 standards

projects.title: Bubble Claim Smart Contract
projects.subtitle: Token Vesting & Staking Management System
projects.description: Smart contract managing token claims over time through structured vesting and staking system, supporting regular claims for NFT holders and special claims for farmers with signature-based verification.
projects.longDescription: BubbleClaim is a smart contract built to manage token claims over time through a structured vesting and staking system. It supports two main claim flows: regular claims for NFT holders and special claims for 'farmers.' Each claim is authorized through a secure signature-based verification and can be directed either to the user's wallet or automatically staked for yield. The contract also handles bonus eligibility based on NFT ownership and staking status, and includes protections like pausing, upgradeability, and signature validity checks. This system plays a key role in managing controlled token distribution over long periods, promoting both fairness and flexibility within the Bubble ecosystem.
challenges: Implementing secure signature-based claim verification
Building flexible vesting system with staking integration
Managing bonus eligibility based on NFT ownership status
achievements: Successfully deployed upgradeable token claim system
Implemented dual-flow claiming for different user types
Built secure signature verification with replay protection

projects.title: Red Packet NFT Smart Contract
projects.subtitle: Upgradeable ERC721 on Polygon
projects.description: Upgradeable ERC721 smart contract deployed on Polygon for efficient NFT distribution with role-based minting, batch operations, and UUPS proxy pattern for cost-effective scaling.
projects.longDescription: RedPacket is an upgradable ERC721 smart contract deployed on Polygon, designed for efficient and controlled NFT distribution. It features role-based minting, batch mint and burn operations, and total supply management to support large-scale token drops. The contract follows OpenZeppelin standards for access control and upgradeability using the UUPS proxy pattern. With flexible metadata handling and secure permissions, RedPacket is optimized for performance and cost-efficiency on Polygon's low-gas infrastructure.
challenges: Optimizing gas costs for large-scale NFT distribution on Polygon
Implementing UUPS proxy pattern for upgradeability
Building efficient batch minting and burning operations
achievements: Successfully deployed cost-efficient NFT contract on Polygon
Implemented OpenZeppelin-standard upgradeable architecture
Built scalable batch operations for mass distribution

projects.title: Boccoroco
projects.subtitle: E-commerce Platform for Fashion & Accessories
projects.description: Comprehensive e-commerce platform for Boccoroco products including shoes, sandals, bags, and luggage with secure payments, shipping integration, affiliate program, and customer service features.
projects.longDescription: The Boccoroco website provides users with a delightful platform to explore and purchase a wide range of Boccoroco products, including shoes, sandals, bags, luggage, and much more. With a user-friendly interface, the website offers a seamless and enjoyable shopping experience. To ensure convenience and flexibility, the Boccoroco website supports various secure payment methods. Users can choose their preferred payment option, whether it's credit card payments, bank transfers, or popular e-wallet services, to complete their transactions with ease and confidence. Shipping is made hassle-free through Boccoroco's collaboration with reliable shipping couriers. Users can expect timely and secure delivery of their purchased products right to their doorstep. Each shipment is handled with care, ensuring that the products arrive in perfect condition. Boccoroco's affiliate program adds an exciting dimension to the website. Users can invite others to sign up to Boccoroco using their unique affiliate code. In return, they earn promo coupons based on the number of people who join using their affiliate code. This program rewards users for sharing their love for Boccoroco products and helps them enjoy exclusive discounts on their future purchases. In the event that a desired product is out of stock, the Boccoroco website offers an indent feature. Users can place an indent request to secure their desired item, ensuring that they don't miss out on their preferred choice even if it's temporarily unavailable. Boccoroco values customer satisfaction and provides a complain and return feature on their website. In the rare instance that a customer is not fully satisfied with their purchase, they can easily communicate their concerns and initiate the return process, ensuring a hassle-free resolution.
challenges: Building comprehensive e-commerce system with multiple payment gateways
Implementing affiliate program with coupon reward system
Integrating shipping courier APIs for automated logistics
Creating inventory management with indent/pre-order functionality
achievements: Successfully launched full-featured e-commerce platform
Implemented secure multi-payment gateway integration
Built effective affiliate marketing system with reward mechanics
Created comprehensive customer service and return management system
